title: Plat 3 Toplaner LFT
body:
Hello my ingame name is Medigen,

I am looking for an serious and active 5 vs 5 or 3 vs 3 Team. I have Ts and Skype, main Top lane.

I am 18 years old and I am looking for a team with plat+ players.

Add me ingame for details. I am german but fluently in english, so international teams wouldnt be a problem.

Medigen
